name: Splitter (Vincent Li)
description:
Made for UGJ2020. Theme of "Two". 

Splitter 

Is a score-attack bullet-hell-esque game where each box you click, spawns two more boxes that try to reach the end of the game's window. Armed only with your mouse, you must try to survive the infinite horde of multicolored boxes by clicking them down, one by one. Use their colored abilities against them, with the explosive black boxes, the chilly cyan boxes and the healing pink boxes. 

Known Bugs:

-The first click to initiate the game jumps your score to the thousands, and increases by the thousands on clicking a new box.

- The first box doesn't disappear properly after being clicked.

Have fun!
